body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.3.3-2 **Reproducible in staging?:** Y **Reproducible in production?:** Y **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** N/A **Expensify/Expensify Issue URL:**https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/576875 **Issue reported by:** multiple migrated customers incl. @twisterdotcom's escalation cited below **Slack conversation**: [#migrate](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C07NMDKEFMH/p1765362343432339) ## Action Performed: 1. Go to global create > Create expense 2. Scan a receipt 3. Click on the receipt preview ## Expected Result: This is a new feature we're bringing across from Classic. 1. Add the `Rotate` `Crop` `Replace` buttons beneath the image, leaving icons for `Download` and `Delete` in the top bar: 2. When clicking `Crop`, replace the three buttons with two buttons to `Cancel` or `Save`. Reveal a draggable border around the receip preview: 3. Allow all four corners of the draggable border to be dragged to crop to the desired size: 4. Clicking `Save` exits the crop mode and resizes the receipt preview accordingly (or `Cancel` to exit without any changes): ## Actual Result: This feature doesn't exist on NewDot currently. ## Workaround: Switch to Classic to use this feature. ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos In-line above. If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** V9.3.4-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/folder/18717689/test-cases/49855697 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** dreamnitethedragon+yydyd373@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Exploratory - Significant User Experience Deterioration **Device used:** Redminote 10S Android 13 **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Pre-condition: Have workspace with USD currency as default Have a self DM 1. Launch app 2. Tap fab - track distance - manual 3. Note when workspace is selected, distance is shown in miles 4. Now change To field as self DM 5. Note Distance is shown in miles 6. Tap distance 7. Note edit distance page is shown in KM ## Expected Result: Distance must be shown in Km in confirm details & distance edit page on selecting self dm while creating track distance. ## Actual Result: Distance is shown in miles in confirm details page & in Km in distance edit page on selecting self dm while creating track distance. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/dc749b51-2fa2-482b-9a4f-b4a026c74fa9 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

body:
## Overview Fix the three issues needed for the Language picker/dropdown on the Sign in screen. Ideally creating a single PR ### Context Part of the accessibility improvement effort tracked in https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/575078 ### Issues to Fix - [ ] #77534 - Screen Reader: Sign in: The button to dismiss the picker view is not announced - [ ] #77541 - Screen Reader: Sign in: Incorrect announcement of the 'Language' dropdown - [ ] #77546 - Screen Reader: Sign in: The button in the picker view is announced without a button role ## Summary of Issues All three issues relate to WCAG 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value compliance for the Language picker component: ## Instructions **Suggested Fixes:** None > **Note:** Discuss on Slack if you are unsure whether a sub-issue should be fixed or if you are unsure about the right fix / expected result. Ideally, create a single PR that will fix all the issues listed to minimize review time (more PRs only if necessary).
